entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind light except north 50 km/h at times late this afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
